Minahil Raza

Master's Student at Erasmus Mundus EDISS

I'm a graduate student at the Erasmus Mundus Joint Master's Degree (EMJMD) programme Engineering of Data-intensive Intelligent Software Systems (EDISS)

More Information:





News

September 11, 2022 I will be attending the University of the Balearic Islands in Spain for the 2nd year of my master's degree. I would specialize in the computer vision and mobile robots track.
August 25, 2022 I spoke to ÅA's instagram regarding my experience in Finland.
August 01, 2022 I got selected amongst the top 20 interns (10%) during the Global Intern Program 2022 at Nokia Bell Labs. I would be presenting my topic in front of the global Bell Labs audience."
May 01, 2022 I have accepted a research internship at Nokia Bell Labs where I would be working on "Dynamic Local Navigation of Ground Robots using Reinforcement Learning."

Experience

Research Intern

The research project is a collaboration between two teams at Nokia Bell Labs -Espoo, Finland and Murray Hills, USA

Research Assistant @ Åboat. Project

Supervised by: Sepinoud Azimi and Sebastien Lafond

Åboat is a project of Åbo Akademi's Faculty of Natural Sciences and Technology, which is led by the Department of Information Technology. Novia University of Applied Sciences (Mast Institute) is also involved in research and development work

Graduate Associate @ Data Science Team

Hobbies

I like to travel and explore different cultures. So far, I have been lucky to visit 17 countries across 3 continents. I love to hear the quirky stories and forktales associated with different regions. I also love to dance, hike and play board games (Catan and scrabble are my favourites). I don't play any sport, however, I love to watch cricket.
